title: Maharani Polki Haaram Set with Ruby Accents
materials: Base Metal: High-quality Alloy with Hyderabadi Polish. Gemstones: Uncut Polki Diamonds
features: This majestic haaram features a graduated design of intricately placed uncut polki diamonds, interspersed with lustrous freshwater pearls. The central pendant showcases a prominent ruby cabochon surrounded by polki diamonds, culminating in a fringe of delicate pearl drops. The matching jhumka earrings echo the pendant's design, creating a harmonious and regal look. The kundan setting style, a hallmark of traditional Indian jewelry, ensures the gemstones are securely held while maximizing their brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish gives the piece a subtle antique finish.
colors: Predominantly white and silver from the polki diamonds and the Hyderabadi polished metal
accented with the deep red of the ruby cabochons and the creamy white of the pearls.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions. Also suitable for upscale gala events and celebrations where a touch of regal elegance is desired.
description: This Polki Haaram set embodies the grandeur of Hyderabad's royal heritage. The use of uncut polki diamonds, each unique in its natural form, guarantees exclusivity. The superior Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster. Its timeless design makes it a cherished heirloom piece to be passed down through generations. The ruby accents symbolize passion and prosperity, adding a deeper layer of meaning to this already stunning set.
